author: Special Correspondent
text:
The autopsy of 42-year-old Mahendar was conducted in the presence of a senior magistrate and officials of the Criminal Investigation Department at Bowring Hospital on Tuesday. The entire process has been recorded on video, police sources said.

CID will be sending viscera sample to the Forensic Science Lab for a detailed analysis along with a few pieces of evidence from the cell in the Jeevan Bhima Police Station where Mahendar had been detained.

The analysis could play a crucial role in the investigation. It will be examined along with the autopsyreport, which is expected on Wednesday, a senior officer said.

On Tuesday, the CID also questioned Mahendar’s employer Purohith, the complainant. The officials are corroborating the details given by him with the station diary.
title: Autopsy conducted
